readable.title: 3354330935_de75be9d2f
readable.content: A person is holding a camera while a skier does a trick . A skier doing a trick by a snow mound while a man films it with a camera . a skier is being filmed by a man with video camera on a jib . A skier wearing blue snow pants is flying through the air near a jump . A skier stands on his hands in the snow in front of a movie camera .
